stimulusHtml: At what time t,0 ≤t ≤8 , is the amount of water in the pipe at a minimum? Justify your answer.

features.html: The rate at which rainwater flows into a drainpipe is modeled by the function R, where  R ( t ) = 20 sin ( t 2 35 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGsbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp caaIYaGaaGimaiGacohacaGGPbGaaiOBamaabmaapaqaa8qadaWcaa WdaeaapeGaamiDa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaaGcpaqaa8qa caaIZaGaaGynaaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@445F@ cubic feet per hour, t is measured in hours, and 0≤t≤8 . The pipe is partially blocked, allowing water to drain out the other end of the pipe at a rate modeled by  D ( t ) = − 0.04 t 3 + 0.4 t 2 + 0.96 t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGebWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp cqGHsislcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaicdacaaI0aGaamiDa8aadaahaaWcbe qaa8qacaaIZaaaaOGaey4kaSIaaGimaiaac6cacaaI0aGaamiDa8aa daahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaaGimaiaac6cacaaI5a GaaGOnaiaadshaaaa@4A44@ or 0 ≤ t ≤ 8. There are 30 cubic feet of water in the pipe at time t=0.
